title: MAC problmem Not connecting when game start!
body:
After the launch of the new patch (7.9) i can't connect to a game anymore! i queue up, the game start and when it start loading champions the screen go white and there is a warning that say "unable to connect" with the reconnect button, i try reconnect but it doesn't reconnect! never had this problem! it started with the new launcher and the new patch! pix fix this thing i can't play anymore!! 
{{champion:43}}  {{champion:43}} {{champion:43}} {{champion:43}} {{champion:43}}

replies.body: I have that same problem as well. And also when I try to spectate games, it gives me a similar message to that. It started right after I was forced to download the new client and patch. Riot, how do we fix this?

Your network seems to be having issues reaching the game server, so it can't download assets and get you in.  You'll want to go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this and fix any blocks that could be causing it.  Test it out in a custom game as well to be safe!  Let me know if you've got any questions about that.
